Title: Tooba Tanveer
Review Text: Monal is amazing, you don't go there for food but for the views & experience. Food ain't bad though.

Title: Explore Saudi Arabia
Review Text: Its a must place to visit whether you are local or foreigner. The natural beauty of this place is mesmerizing. Whether you come in day or night, summer or winter you will never regret. The only bad thing is that road is dangerous because …

Title: Touseef Fatima
Review Text: A Must visit place in Islamabad. slightly expensive but real adventure to go there. Be careful to drive.

Title: Hafiz Azad
Review Text: Very very good place and very very much expensive.... Tea price 300 small pizza 1600 everything is expensive

Title: Mustafa Khan
Review Text: Very good experience overall , a place to chill, and definitely a place to hang out with boys or with someone special

Title: Irtifa Irshad
Review Text:
No Doubt Monal is such a beautiful place in islamabad when you wish to eat with a perfect view ,
and their service is also on point ,
but the main problem is , it is so much expensive , like i ordered 1 breakfast platter which has 1 paratha , 2 puri , halwa , Alu bhujiya , Chanay , a season juice , coffee/Tea and a cheese omelette (cheese and Olive have bad taste) , and it cost me around 850rs , and its only for 1 person if you want to satiate your full hunger

Title: Mohsina Rafique
Review Text: This restaurant offers breath taking view of Islamabad. But to reach this resort is real challange. Parking is big issue. Parking for handicap persons is not adequate. The place is overcrowded. Seating and tables are extremely congested. Wheel chair access to dinning areas is restricted.

Title: Farhan Jalil
Review Text: Average food. Their COVID SoPs are not up to the mark. Parking is a huge problem . Seems to be a little mismanaged .

Title: Intezar Kumbhar
Review Text:
Worst service I've had in recent times.
Would have been 5 stars for food and ambience if their manager learn some manners

Title: Atif Altaf
Review Text: Average taste cold food slow service. They just charging you for the view and hospitality. I never visit them again.

Title: Abdullah Munshi
Review Text: Its not hated place ... rather the restaurant is closed on Government orders. Rare chances 9f its opening and maintenance. Wild animals can be seen due to lack of human presence. Only a parking place near mosque was open when I visited it in August first week 2020.

Title: sabeera hussain
Review Text: Expensive  phr ata hn monal islamabad

Title: Muhammad Danish
Review Text: The monal special burger was tasty and flavoursome. The other food was average. We paid mainly for the view it seems. I would rate this place 2stars due to the staff giving us the wrong bill which came to over double the amount of the value …

Title: Khalil Ur Rahman
Review Text: A very famous restaurant at Pir Suhawa. Too expensive compared to food taste and quality. Substandard service level due to over occupancy. They don't bother any complaint or stopping annoyed customers.

Title: Abdul Bari Khan
Review Text: Very expensive. LA Montana restaurant which is just beside the monal is much less expensive and food is very good.

Title: Umar Khaliq
Review Text: Best place to dine out if you are in Islamabad. But expensive. Very cold in winters.

Title: Ali Butt
Review Text: Little bit pricey but once in a while, a must place to visit....

Title: Hasan AlAgele
Review Text:
The restaurant only offers one thing and that is a view of Islamabad. The food is terrible, substandard and overpriced. You can get better pakistani food at roadside dhabbas. The worst are their platters, in which mostly leftover and stale food is served.
The washrooms are dirty. Parking is a mess
Not recommended at all,

Title: Qari Yousuf Siddiquei
Review Text: I m disagree monal food quality is too low shame on u monal it is not your status

Title: Shahid Ali Syed
Review Text: Food quality very poor
